recipes.name: Pesto Penne Pasta
recipes.description: Quick and easy pesto penne pasta is a simple and light Italian pasta dish made with just five ingredients in under 15 minutes. The easiest dinner.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy spaghetti carbonara (Spaghetti a la Carbonara) is a simple classic Italian pasta with pancetta that's quick and easy to make in minutes..

recipes.name: Mascarpone Pesto Pasta
recipes.description: Quick and easy mascarpone pesto pasta is the tastiest creamy pasta dish you’ll ever make in under 15 minutes. It's the best weeknight dinner.

recipes.name: Chicken Penne Pasta
recipes.description: Chicken penne pasta is a quick and easy dinner that is delicious, rich, creamy, and flavorful. It’s a family favorite that’s ready in under 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Quick easy spaghetti bolognese with a rich, thick, delicious and flavourful meat sauce is a family favourite ready in 30 minutes. Best weeknight dinner.

recipes.name: Creamy Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy shrimp pasta with sun-dried tomatoes is a delicious, quick and easy meal that takes just 20 minutes to prep and make. The perfect weeknight dinner.

recipes.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
recipes.description: Quick and easy spaghetti and meatballs is delicious, rich, comforting with tender beef meatballs simmered in a savoury tomato sauce.

recipes.name: Ripple Ice Cream
recipes.description: Ice cream is possibly America’s favorite dessert. It’s sweet, creamy, and delicioulsy cold.

recipes.name: Fruit Ice Cream
recipes.description: Some of the most common flavors are chocolate, vanilla, butter pecan, mint chocolate chip, and strawberry.

recipes.name: Tart Pastry
recipes.description: Pie pastry is typically flaky, whereas tart pastry is thicker and will hold its shape when you pick it up.

recipes.name: Vanilla Ice Cream
recipes.description: Vanilla ice cream is a sweet frozen dessert made from milk, cream, sugar, and vanilla flavoring from vanilla seeds.

recipes.name: Classic Chiffon Cake
recipes.description: Light and buttery, this simple cake is elevated with loads of fresh strawberries and a whipped cream.

recipes.name: Classic CheeseCake
recipes.description: This cake has a classic graham cracker crust and a traditional cream cheese and sour cream filling that’s flavored with a touch of lemon.

recipes.name: Toasted Coconut Honey
recipes.description: This soft, light cake is filled with coconutty goodness inside and out. The cream cheese frosting is finished.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Fudge
recipes.description: Peanut butter ice cream, whipped cream, a chocolate cookie crust and a rich fudge sauce come together.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
recipes.description: One of the most popular sandwiches served for breakfast in many cafes around the world. Quite easy to prepare, fresh due to vegetables.

recipes.name: Roast Beef Sandwich
recipes.description: For a roast beef sandwich, take a ciabatta, grease it with mustard inside. Spread lettuce, tomatoes, meat, salsa on top.

recipes.name: Chicken Sandwich
recipes.description: Сhicken Sandwich is one of the most popular sandwiches served for breakfast in many cafes around the world. Quite easy to prepare.

recipes.name: Seafood Sandwich
recipes.description: On the toast of fragrant rye bread, there is tender lightly salted salmon, Edam cheese, crispy cucumbers, and lettuce leaves.

recipes.name: Mutton Kathi Roll
recipes.description: kathi roll is a street-food that originated in Kolkata? Mutton filled kathis are an all time favourite of dedicated meat lovers

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka Kathi Roll
recipes.description: paneerstacked in the brilliance of egg parathas is sure to be winner! You can add in veggies of your choice to up its nutritional value

recipes.name: Chicken Shawarma
recipes.description: Shawarma has its genesis in the Turkish doner kebab. Bite in to these mouthwatering rolls loaded with chicken and authentic masalas.

recipes.name: Burritos with Minced Meat Filling
recipes.description: This classic Mexican delicacy will knock your socks off! Flour tortillas stuffed with a generous helping of mildly-spiced minced meat mixture.

recipes.name: Wedge Salad
recipes.description: A wedge salad is made from a halved or quartered head of iceberg lettuce. The leaves are kept intact and not separated or shredded.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan tossed with a dressing featuring lemon juice, olive oil, etc

recipes.name: Leafy Green Salad
recipes.description: is a general term that can refer to any tossed salad made with greens, such as iceberg lettuce, arugula, and spinach.

recipes.name: Niçoise Salad
recipes.description: Traditionally, salade niçoise is made with tomatoes, hard-boiled eggs, anchovies or tuna, and Niçoise olives.

recipes.name: Fattoush Salad
recipes.description: Fattoush is a Levantine salad composed of mixed greens and toasted or fried khubz, or flatbread. It often includes vegetables.

recipes.name: Cobb Salad
recipes.description: A Cobb is a hearty salad, so it's generally served as an entree instead of a side dish. It's made with chopped lettuce, bacon.

recipes.name: Chicken Salad
recipes.description: usually refers to a dish made of shredded chicken and mayonnaise. Other common chicken salad ingredients are grapes, pickles, and onions.

recipes.name: Waldorf Salad
recipes.description: A Waldorf salad is a fruity, nutty salad that gets its name from the Waldorf-Astoria hotel in New York where it originated.
